description: President Alexander Lukashenko's opponents give him 13 days to resign, amid ongoing protests.
title: Belarus opposition threatens Lukashenko with mass strike
title_page: Belarus opposition threatens Lukashenko with mass strike - BBC News
maintext: "Everyone who has not yet made the decision to switch to the side of the people is an accessory to terror. Declare publicly that you no longer support the regime," Mrs Tikhanovskaya continued in what many consider her strongest statement to date.
